name: The Archives
landing_text: $(br2)You hold the $(thing)Eye of Horus$(), a relic of a civilization that walked among the stars long before humanity learned to build with stone.$(br2)These $(italic)Archives$() preserve what the Architects left behind: their technology, their materials, and perhaps the means to bring them back.$(br2)Use the tabs on the left to explore.
subtitle: Alien Technology Compendium
